```{r setup}
library(utVizSankey)
```

## An example dataset

In the utVizSankey package, and example dataset "admissions" is available.

```{r}
data(admissions, package = "utVizSankey")

head(admissions)
```

The dataset contains `r ncol(admissions)` variables and `r nrow(admissions)` observations.
